attributes.action: Call for ROYAL COMMISION into POLICING
attributes.additional_details:
Winsor attacks the Police in a report. Hutton attacks Police pensions in a report. The government cut Police by 20%. ACPO staff sacked and under investigation for various allegations. Winsor appointed HMCIC.
The thin Blue Line would have snapped if it was not for the true workers. Support the Police Constable and call for a ROYAL COMMISION into POLICING.
